name: Artmos 36
description:
This is our submission for the Pizza Jam 2019. The theme is Galaxy Requiem where you are a space pilot fighting an onslaught of enemy's. Your objective is to defeat their leader and claim victory

Controls are 

Movement with A,W,S,D and fire with left and right click 

Current version only work on windows

Art by Luiz E Gonzales

Code by Jorge E Ramirez

Music borrow from Rama game ("Rama Theme")
